text: , better known as , was a Japanese actor and voice actor. He was born in Ōhito, Shizuoka, Japan (now Izunokuni, Shizuoka). He was known for his roles in The Demon, Mr. Baseball and The X from Outer Space. Hozumi died on October 19, 2018 from gallbladder cancer, aged 87.「積木くずし」穂積隆信さん、死去 胆のうがん８７歳 == References == Category:1931 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Japanese movie actors Category:Japanese voice actors Category:People from Shizuoka Prefecture Category:Deaths from gallbladder cancer
title: Takanobu Hozumi
